scripts.publishToHeroku: cd ../ && git subtree push --prefix server heroku-server master || true
scripts.database-config: cat database/config.sql | heroku pg:psql postgresql-dimensional-21825 --app breezebnb-api
scripts.database-create-tables: cat database/create-all-tables.sql | heroku pg:psql postgresql-dimensional-21825 --app breezebnb-api
scripts.database-drop-tables: cat database/drop-all-tables.sql | heroku pg:psql postgresql-dimensional-21825 --app breezebnb-api
